situation.title: EET postponement
situation.meta_description: Postponement of all four phases of electronic sales records lasts until January 1st, 2023.

content.processed:
Postponement of EET (electronic sales records)

Postponement of all four phases of electronic sales records lasts until January 1st, 2023.

The postponement applies to all waves of EET. Including both entrepreneurs from the 1st and 2nd wave, who have already been 
registering their sales, and the 3rd and 4th wave of entrepreneurs, who have been waiting for their start. 

During the interruption, you do not face any fines for not recording sales.

More information about the EET here, and also on the e-sales website.
